text: Oscar Schneider (born 3 June 1927) is a german politician, lawyer and member of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany. From 1982 to 1989, he was the Minister of Housing, Urban Development and Building during the Helmut Kohl government. From 1969 to 1994, he was a member of the German Bundestag. He was born in Roth, Bavaria, Germany. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Bavaria Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:German lawyers Category:Housing and Urban Development ministers of Germany
title: Oscar Schneider
